title: Non Lynda - Drawing The Torso in 3 Colors
description:
Drawing The Torso in 3 Colors

Audio: aac 44100 Hz stereo | Video: mpeg4 yuv420p 1280x720 29.97 fps
Danny Galieote | 55 minutes 56 seconds | Intermediate - Advanced | 551 MB
Genre: eLearning | Uploaded in Feb 18, 2015 by 2boweb

In this lesson master draftsman and painter Danny Galieote will demonstrate a variation on the traditional trois crayons or three-color chalk drawing technique. You will learn how to block in a gesture of the figure establish three-dimensional structures and add core shadows and rhythms using your primary color. Next you will discover how to work into your drawing with darker and white chalks to push the tonal range and enhance the visual impact of your work
